column1: Uchi////I dined at Uchi for my birthday recently
column2: and hands down it was the best dining experience I've had in a Long time! The beautiful hostess
column4: made our reservation and sat us promptly with grace and charm. Our waiter
column6: (request him he's THE best and super hot!) treated us like royalty. We allowed him to make all of the selections for us. Each dish was more unique and delicious than the previous. Every single person working that night that we met had the best energy
column7: and they were all just happy to be there! It wasn't just a dinner
column8: it was an experience. I can't wait to go back. The manager that night
column10: must be doing something very right to have such an amazing staff coupled with mouth watering food that made every other meal this week feel dismal in comparison.
